name: Parchisi Club-Online Dice Game
description:
Play Parchisi Club - the best board game to play with friends! Enter the world of this multicolor game - Parchisi, and be a Parchisi star!

This is the free online multiplayer version of the epic hit dice game Parchisi (which also has variations such as Ludo, Parchis, and Parcheesi around the world)! Join an exclusive club of star players in this multicolor game of Parchisi - roll the dice with buddies, climb the ladders, master the skills of this Parchisi game and become the KING OF PARCHISI!

As far as lively board games full of color go, Parchisi Club is unmatched! Learn how to move your red, yellow, green or blue pieces with strategy and luck on the best looking games board of this online Parchisi game. Compete against the best Parchis players from around the world and reach the top of the leaderboard! This is a fast, dice roll based board game that involves both luck and skill (just like Ludo, Parchis, and Parcheesi)! Master the various tips and tricks of this exciting dice game and show your best talent to everyone! Be a champion and become a Parchisi star!

Parchisi Club has several exciting features!
◆ You can play this dice game with friends and family by sending Facebook and Whatsapp invites!
◆ You don’t need to sacrifice your data to become a Parchisi star, Parchisi Club uses very little data and runs very smoothly on 2G, 3G, 4G! So don’t worry and enjoy this multi color board game with gameplay very similar to Ludo!
◆ This online Parchis app also includes support for offline play and vs Computer! So you’ll never be alone even if you can’t play this Parchisi game with friends!
◆ You can roll the dice with buddies and also chat with them simultaneously on the games board of this Parchisi game! If you have already played Ludo with friends, playing this multi color game of Parcheesi will be a cakewalk for you!
◆ This dice game also offers gives you a choice to play Parchis with either 2 or 4 players. Play a 2-player game if you have only a few minutes to play or play a 4-player game if you have ample time!
◆ This Parchis game is very F2P friendly, you can win FREE coins using our Daily Bonus and Jackpot features so that you don’t run out of coins in your journey to become a Parchisi star!

Looking for hours of non-stop enjoyment on your phone? Install Parchisi Club and play everyone's favourite childhood board game of Parchis from the developers of India's favourite games - Ludo Club, Teen Patti Gold and Jalebi. This Parcheesi game is available in loud, striking colors and beautiful board and dice designs for your phone's HD display. Play this dice game of Parchis - an exciting variation of Ludo, make friends, become a Parchisi star, and dive into the exciting world of this multicolor game of Parchisi Club!

What are you waiting for? Let's roll the dice!
